controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include appropriate risk-based systems and controls to verify that a registered co-operative exists when notified by the customer?
controls.detail-label: Describe the systems and controls you have implemented to verify co-operative existence.

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include appropriate risk-based systems and controls to verify that the names of the chairman, secretary or equivalent officer of the co-operative have been provided?
controls.detail-label: Describe the systems and controls you have implemented to obtain and verify officer details.

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include a procedure to collect the full name of the registered co-operative?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for collecting the full name of the co-operative.

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include a procedure to collect the co-operative's registered office address or principal place of operations (or residential address of the secretary, president or treasurer if no office address available)?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for collecting the co-operative's address details.

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include a procedure to collect any unique identifying number issued to the co-operative upon its registration by the relevant State, Territory or overseas body?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for collecting the co-operative's registration number.

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include a procedure to collect the full names of the chairman, secretary and treasurer or equivalent officers of the co-operative?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for collecting the names of the co-operative's officers.

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include appropriate risk-based systems and controls to determine whether additional KYC information beyond the minimum requirements should be collected for a registered co-operative?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based process for determining when to collect additional information about co-operatives.

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include a procedure to verify the full name of the co-operative from ASIC, the registration body, co-operative registers, or reliable and independent documents or electronic data?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for verifying the co-operative's full name.

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include a procedure to verify any unique identifying number issued to the co-operative upon its registration from ASIC, the registration body, co-operative registers, or reliable and independent documents or electronic data?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for verifying the co-operative's registration number.

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include appropriate risk-based systems and controls to determine whether additional KYC information beyond the minimum requirements should be verified for a registered co-operative?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based process for determining when to verify additional information about co-operatives.

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program require that verification of information about a registered co-operative be based on co-operative registers, minutes of meetings, information from the registration body, or reliable and independent documents or electronic data?
controls.detail-label: Describe the verification sources and methods you use for co-operatives.

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program permit the use of disclosure certificates as reliable and independent documents to verify co-operative information when it is not otherwise reasonably available from prescribed sources?
controls.detail-label: Describe the circumstances in which you use disclosure certificates and how you determine when information is not reasonably available.

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include appropriate risk-based systems and controls to respond to discrepancies that arise during verification of co-operative information?
controls.detail-label: Describe your process for identifying, investigating and resolving discrepancies in co-operative information.

groups.title: General CDD Obligation
groups.description: Initial risk-based systems and controls to verify co-operative existence and key officer details.

groups.title: Collection of KYC Information
groups.description: Minimum KYC information to be collected about registered co-operatives, with risk-based assessment for additional information.

groups.title: Verification of Information
groups.description: Minimum verification requirements and permitted sources, including disclosure certificates for information not readily available.

groups.title: Additional KYC Assessment
groups.description: Risk-based determination of whether to collect and verify additional KYC information beyond minimum requirements.

groups.title: Responding to Discrepancies
groups.description: Risk-based systems and controls to manage discrepancies discovered during verification.

groups.title: Disclosure Certificate Procedure
groups.description: Optional use of disclosure certificates as reliable and independent documents when information is not otherwise reasonably available.
